page.title: 07LEISURE FOR CHILDREN
page.content: We carried out a survey to find out what some children do in their spare time.We found that their answers varied according to the season,weather etc.In the summer months many children enjoyed playing outdoors doing such things as riding bycicles,going swimming,playing on the beach,jogging,keeping fit and fishing.In the winter months,many children spent time watching television.Some said this was because they enjoyed it others said they like the veriaty of programmes.Reading books was another favourite for relaxation.
